page.title: 20HOUSING AND ITS EFFECTS.
page.content: Most of the houses and land in the area used to be owned by {Ribston {Estate.}Some of the houses have been sold to private people.Some are let to people who work on the{Estate.}Others are let to private tenants.Some of the farms are also let to private tenants. There are several houses that have been built recently,some that have been improved,and some that have been converted from old buildings.There are also 4 council houses and 4 pensioners bungalows.There are some houses that have been empty for a long time and there are 2 derelict ones.The local Planning Department(Harrogate District Council)has no plans to develop the area for residential purposes.As family size has decreased the population of the area has also dwindled,the school population has shrunk so staffing has been reduced.
